resources.string: I am a full-stack developer and excel at programming front-end and back-end servieces in variety of languages, frameworks and platforms including ANDROID.
The features including in this app are two intro screens, navigation drawer, facebook and google login, listing and viewing news, search using number api etc.
I have developed this app based on the given instructions. I have used the libraries that was mentioned.
You can search using number and can get the trivia and also get history through date searching with the help of number api.
User can login either by google or facebook api.
The features including in this app are two intro screens, navigation drawer, facebook and google login, listing and viewing news, search using number api etc.
